name: Blocks (itch) (campotech)
description:
Blocks the campotech classic has arrived on X-Station!!!

Another Campotech classic has arrived on X-Station....Blocks! A Tetris clone originally released for the Campo 3200 super system back in 2019. This is a Tetris clone.

CONTROLS

Keyboard

Left, Right, Down keys = move block

Up key = Rotate block

X Key = Drop Block

P Key = Pause the game and unpause

Space = Reset game

Escape = End Game
